definition: to fight/to exchange blows
(experienced action marker)
surname Guo
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
to recruit/to provoke/to beckon/to incur/to infect/contagious/a move (chess)/a maneuver/device/trick/to confess

sentences.english: The challenge: Well, how about trading blows with some of the world's biggest companies?
sentences.chinese: 同世界上最大的公司過招，這應該也算一種挑戰吧？

sentences.english: Dense months after with fate, died in gelsenkirchen grips.
sentences.chinese: 密月與逆天過招後，死於毒手。

definition: to spar/to fight/to duke it out
lit. veteran of a hundred battles (idiom)/fig. experienced/seasoned
magic trick
lit. don't fight, won't make friends (idiom); an exchange of blows may lead to friendship/no discord, no concord
unique skill/unexpected tricky move (as a last resort)/masterstroke/finishing blow
affairs of the heart/mutual relationship
to fight openly and maneuver covertly (idiom)

opponent/substantial adversary/worthy match/antagonist/in the enemy's hands

young and promising

harmony is to be prized
fight a battle of words/cross verbal swords
